testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is valid does not throw an error
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is valid does not throw an error

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is a string
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is a string

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID contains symbols
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID contains symbols

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is a floating point number
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is a floating point number

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is 0
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is 0

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is a negative number

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is undefined
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if the account ID is undefined

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if an account ID is not provided
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #requestIdValidator when the account ID is missing or invalid throws an error if an account ID is not provided

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #ticketTypeRequestValidator when the ticket request is valid does not throw an error
testcase.name: #RequestValidationService #ticketTypeRequestValidator when the ticket request is valid does not throw an error

testcase.classname: #RequestValidationService #ticketTypeRequestValidator when the ticket request is missing or invalid throws an error if no ticket requests are provided
